title: [1.7.10-1.5.1][ssp/smp]Explodables Mod 可爆物mod 可控制的爆破！
author: zhangfei
txt_content:
Explodables Mod   控制你的炸药！


增加新炸药，你能控制你的炸药们！
本mod所有炸药源于TNT，所有物品源于原版怪物掉落物
简介：This mod adds many new Explosives to use along with the basic TNT. These are designed to be much safer, both to yourself and the blocks around where you are blasting, and much more flexible allowing you to control what is destroyed by the explosion


[backcolor=rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.796875)]这个mod添加了许多新的炸药以和及基本的TNT炸药一起使用。[backcolor=rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.796875)]这些炸药被设计的更安全,自己和自己周围的方块都更加灵活的允许您控制被爆炸毁坏了！（好像是病句）


新炸药 New Explosives:

Shaped Charge
This is a basic explosive slightly more powerful than TNT, but the key benefit is that you can control which direction it will explode in.
Blasting Gel
This is an explosive gel that can be applied to a suface and will blast downwards through several layers. It can also carry current like redstone allowing you to trigger large quantities simultaneously.
Spoke Bomb
This specially designed tunnelling explosive will blast through several layers in any direction and coat the inside of the tunnel with a protective iron mesh. This stops blocks such as sand from falling into your tunnel.
Claymore Mine
This powerful directional explosive will kill any living thing in the blast area without damaging blocks or other items. Very useful for defending your property from intruders.
Breaching Charge
Again this is a directional explosive, but this is designed specifically for breaching and entering enemy buildings. It can destroy doors and windows and will even blow open obsidian doors.



LZ的汉化如下：
锥形装药
这是一个基本炸药,他比TNT爆炸更强大,但关键的好处是:你可以控制哪个方向它会爆炸。
爆破凝胶
这是一个有爆炸性的凝胶,可以应用于地表面,将制造几层向下的爆炸。它可以携带电流,就像红石允许您同时触发大量。
音波炸弹
这个特别设计的隧道爆炸将造成几层爆炸,它们可以在任何方向爆炸,爆出隧道,隧道内会涂一层保护铁网。这将停止落纱方块如沙子落入你的隧道。
克莱莫地雷(超粘土炸弹？)
这种强大的定向爆炸将杀死在爆炸区的任何生物,不破坏任何方块或其他物品,保护你的财产免受入侵者时非常有用。
违反电荷炸弹
这还是一个定向爆炸,但这是专门为突破而设计的,进入敌人的建筑物。它可以破坏门窗,甚至会把黑曜石门（见方块）打开。


物品：

Plastic Explosive
Used to make Shaped Charges and Spoke Bombs.
Gelatine
Used to make Blasting Gel.
Molten Iron
Used to make Spoke Bombs.
Scrap Iron
Obtained from tunnel reinforcing mesh, can be melted back into Molten Iron.



无助了，硬着头皮翻译下去:
[backcolor=rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.792969)]塑料炸药
[backcolor=rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.792969)]用于制造锥形炸药和音波炸弹。
[backcolor=rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.792969)]胶
[backcolor=rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.792969)]用于制造爆破凝胶。
[backcolor=rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.792969)]水状铁 
[backcolor=rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.792969)]用于制造音波炸弹。
[backcolor=rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.792969)]铁屑
[backcolor=rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.792969)]从隧道钢筋网(音波炸弹的隧道网)采集,可以融化回水状铁。



新方块：

Explosives Chest
A specially designed chest that can withstand any explosion. Perfect for storing all your precious explosives!
Reinforced Glass
Glass reinforced with obsidian to make it significantly stronger and even stop explosions.
Reinforced Glass Pane
Same as Reinforced glass but thinner.
Obsidian Door
A simple door but with the benefits of being made out of obsidian



翻译吧 无奈：
[backcolor=rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.796875)]炸药箱
[backcolor=rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.796875)]一个特别设计的箱子,可以承受任何爆炸。[backcolor=rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.796875)]适合储存你所有的珍贵的炸药!
[backcolor=rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.796875)]强化玻璃
[backcolor=rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.796875)]玻璃纤维与黑曜石,让它更强,甚至阻止爆炸。
[backcolor=rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.796875)]强化玻璃面板
[backcolor=rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.796875)]强化玻璃一样抗爆但是更薄！
[backcolor=rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.796875)]黑曜石门
[backcolor=rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.796875)]一个简单的门但是的好处是用黑曜石做的，防爆！


终于好了……呼呼呼

网络图片容易挂 挂了叫我


终于完了 地址在这：

1.7.2/1.7.10是一个文件（中间的174 175等等都不行）
度娘网盘链接

最近本人要发布服务器急需到6级，跪求大神给点人气吧……
